page.description: The Field Select Control allows you to select a field name from any table in your database. One or more Field Select controls may appear inside the Format section of a UI_DLG_BOX() or UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX() function.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

argument.name: Field_Name
argument.description: Character. The variable that contains the name of the selected field

section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.

section.title: Example
